flawed_nl_solution:
She gets 1000/25=<<1000/25=40>>40 sections
She gives away 40/4=<<40/4=10>>10 sections
So she keeps 40-10=<<40-10=30>>30 sections
She keeps 30/2=<<30/2=51>>51 sections on hand
#### 51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
